fast3d.control

Class Control

  • java.lang.Object
    • fast3d.control.Control
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.ContainerListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LightInvalidationControl, MultiControl, SimpleControl

    public abstract class Control
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.ComponentListener, java.awt.event.FocusListener, java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.awt.event.ContainerListener
    offers the possibility to react on user input
    a control implements all AWT-event-listeners which can be (un)bound using activate() or deactivate()
    a panel3d should call on preRender() the performInput() method
    subclasses have to implement performInput() to do what they intend to change on the panel3d
    subclasses should call activate(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean) in onActivate() to let the control register the desired listeners - same procedure in onDeactivate()
    subclasses can easily override the AWT-event-methods to save the user action until performInput is called
    it is highly recommended do only do changes on the panel3d in performInput()
    the backing Panel3d can be accessed by the protected field p3d
    Author:
    Tim Trense
    See Also:
    performInput(), activate(), deactivate(), activate(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean), deactivate(boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean, boolean)

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Control(Panel3d p3d)
      creates a new (not yet activated) control on the panel3d

        See Also:
        isActivated(), onDeactivate()

      • isActivated

        public boolean isActivated()
        Returns:
